description: Located in the lot of Weston Nurseries in Downtown Hopkinton is this incredibly quaint house-shaped trailer where you’ll find a tasty selection of hot dogs and homemade condiments. Lisa Hachey & Teresa Boyce, with the help of friends and family, hand-built Snappy Dogs from the ground up so that they could serve their fellow friendly locals the perfect handheld meal. Their menu offers an assortment of Pearl all-beef dogs, turkey dogs, chicken sausages, jalapeño dogs, and more. Their condiments are crafted with fresh seasonal ingredients and include cranberry relish, red onion relish, rhubarb chutney, jerk ketchup, and Dr. Pepper BBQ sauce, to name a few. Feeling hungry? Come appease your appetite with a savory treat from Snappy Dogs!
name: Snappy Dogs
